name: Demons & Sinners (Rookbird Games)
description:
You've committed a horrible sin. Your devotion has given you the opportunity to redeem yourself. 7 demons are hungry for souls. Solve the riddles to feed them.

Play with the arrows and the return key. Exit with Alt + F4 (sorry!).

Made for the Pizza Jam 4 in 48 hs.

Art by Franco Chioraia & Kate Olmazabal

Programming by Marcos Alvarez & Emanuel Rodriguez

Music by Lorenzo Gutierrez
